description:
Unit One chases a suspect in the staged crash, Hyper Transport Co. executive Yonehara Takumi, into an abandoned zone. But when they track Yonehara down, they find he`s already dead. Arata and Kei ignore Chief Shimotsuki`s orders and pursue the mastermind, Sasagawa, to Ariake Airport, where two unfamiliar men stand in their way: Kougami Shinya and Ginoza Nobuchika of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
Source: Amazon
